capabilities.name: listNotionDatabases
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of databases the user has access to in Notion.

capabilities.name: queryNotionDatabase
capabilities.description: Retrieves and filters items from a specified Notion database.

capabilities.name: listNotionPages
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of pages the user has access to in Notion.

capabilities.name: readNotionPage
capabilities.description: Retrieves the content of a Notion page in the specified format.

capabilities.name: createNotionPage
capabilities.description: Creates a new page in Notion with specified content.

capabilities.name: createNotionComment
capabilities.description: Adds a plain text comment to a Notion page.

capabilities.name: searchNotion
capabilities.description: Searches across a Notion workspace for pages, databases, and content matching the query.

capabilities.name: listMondayBoards
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of boards associated with the authenticated user from Monday.

capabilities.name: readMondayBoard
capabilities.description: Retrieves all items from the specified Monday board. The items can be arbitrary JSON objects.

capabilities.name: createMondayItem
capabilities.description: Creates a new item in the specified Monday board and group with optional column values. The `column_values` parameter should follow the format `{ "column_id": "value" }` for each column to be set.

capabilities.name: updateMondayItem
capabilities.description: Updates an existing item in the specified Monday board with new column values. The `column_values` parameter is **required** and should always include the updated field(s) in `{ "column_id": "new_value" }` format.

capabilities.name: createMondayUpdate
capabilities.description: Creates a new update (comment) on the specified Monday.com item with optional parent_id for threaded replies.

capabilities.name: listAsanaWorkspaces
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of workspaces associated with the authenticated user from Asana.

capabilities.name: listAsanaProjects
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of projects associated with the specified Asana workspace.

capabilities.name: readAsanaProject
capabilities.description: Retrieves all tasks from the specified Asana project. The tasks can be arbitrary JSON objects.

capabilities.name: listAsanaTasks
capabilities.description: Retrieves tasks from Asana filtered by project, assignee, and completion status.

capabilities.name: createAsanaTask
capabilities.description: Creates a new task in the specified Asana project with optional details like description, due date, assignee, and custom fields.

capabilities.name: updateAsanaTask
capabilities.description: Updates an existing Asana task with new values for name, notes, due date, assignee, completion status, or custom fields.

capabilities.name: createAsanaComment
capabilities.description: Creates a new comment (story) on the specified Asana task.

capabilities.name: searchAsanaTasks
capabilities.description: Searches for tasks in Asana that match the search term, with optional filtering by workspace, project, and completion status.

capabilities.name: listSlackChannels
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of public and private channels from the authenticated user's Slack workspace.

capabilities.name: postSlackMessage
capabilities.description: Sends a text message to a specified Slack channel in the authenticated user's workspace.

capabilities.name: readSlackChannel
capabilities.description: Retrieves conversation history from a specified Slack channel, including thread replies.

capabilities.name: listAirtableBases
capabilities.description: Returns a list of all Airtable bases the authenticated user has access to

capabilities.name: listAirtableTables
capabilities.description: Returns a list of all tables in the specified Airtable base

capabilities.name: listAirtableRecords
capabilities.description: Retrieves records from the specified table with optional filtering and pagination

capabilities.name: createAirtableRecord
capabilities.description: Creates a new record with the specified fields in the given table

capabilities.name: updateAirtableRecord
capabilities.description: Updates the specified fields of an existing record in the given table

capabilities.name: listGoogleDocs
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of Google Docs from the user's Drive, ordered by last modified date.

capabilities.name: readGoogleDoc
capabilities.description: Retrieves the content of a specific Google Doc as plain text.

capabilities.name: listOfficeDocs
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of Office documents and folders from OneDrive, ordered by last modified date.

capabilities.name: readOfficeDoc
capabilities.description: Retrieves the content of a specific Office document as text, converted from PDF.

capabilities.name: searchOfficeDocs
capabilities.description: Searches for Office documents matching a specific query string.

capabilities.name: recentOfficeDocs
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of recently used Office documents by the user.

capabilities.name: listTeamsChannels
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of teams and channels from the authenticated user's Microsoft Teams workspace.

capabilities.name: postTeamsMessage
capabilities.description: Sends a text message to a specified Microsoft Teams channel.

capabilities.name: listMiroBoards
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of boards associated with the authenticated user from Miro.

capabilities.name: getMiroBoard
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific Miro board including its items (sticky notes, shapes, etc.).

capabilities.name: postMiroNote
capabilities.description: Adds a new sticky note with specified content to a Miro board at the given position.

capabilities.name: listJiraProjects
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of projects accessible to the authenticated user from Jira.

capabilities.name: listJiraIssues
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of issues from a Jira project or using a JQL query.

capabilities.name: readJiraProject
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed information about a Jira project, including all available issue types with their IDs.

capabilities.name: createJiraIssue
capabilities.description: Creates a new issue in a specified Jira project with the provided details.

capabilities.name: updateJiraIssue
capabilities.description: Updates an existing issue in Jira with the provided details.

capabilities.name: addJiraComment
capabilities.description: Adds a new comment to an existing Jira issue.

capabilities.name: listLinearTeams
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of teams associated with the authenticated user from Linear.

capabilities.name: listLinearProjects
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of projects from Linear.

capabilities.name: listLinearIssues
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of issues from Linear.

capabilities.name: listMyLinearIssues
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of issues assigned to the authenticated user in Linear.

capabilities.name: createLinearIssue
capabilities.description: Creates a new issue in Linear with the specified details.

capabilities.name: updateLinearIssue
capabilities.description: Updates an existing issue in Linear with the specified changes.

capabilities.name: createLinearComment
capabilities.description: Creates a new comment on an existing issue in Linear.

capabilities.name: helloWayStation
capabilities.description: Call this action when users says 'Hello WayStation'. It displays welcome information about WayStation to the user

capabilities.name: openWayStation
capabilities.description: Call this action when users says 'Open WayStation'. Opens the WayStation desktop application
